Title: Miraculous: Ladybug & Cat Noir, the Movie
Writer: Jeremy Zag, Bettina Lopez Mendoza, Thomas Astruc
Actors: Annouck Hautbois, Benjamin Bollen, Antoine Tomé
Plot: Ordinary teenager Marinette's life in Paris goes superhuman when she becomes Ladybug. Bestowed with magical powers of creation, Ladybug must unite with her opposite, Cat Noir, to save Paris as a new villain unleashes chaos unto th...
